entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as looking 'quite demented' and screeching at Harry Potter, indicating that she is upset and out of control. She demands her wand back from Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is accused by Hermione and is forced to retreat several steps due to the 'male-diction' she casts at him.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is addressed by Hermione, who tells him not to tell her what to do. He also witnesses Ron's retreat due to Hermione's 'male-diction'.

entities.name: wand
entities.description: Hermione demands that Harry give her back her wand, which she claims is rightfully hers.

relationships.description: Hermione accuses Ron of taking her wand and casts a 'male-diction' at him, causing him to retreat.
Hermione addresses Harry Potter, telling him not to tell her what to do.
